question.title: QuickFIX/J with Virtual Threads
question.body:
Does QuickFIX/J works fine with Java Virtual Threads? Is it enough to just set custom ExecutorFactory?

var initiator = ThreadedSocketInitiator.newBuilder()
                    .withApplication(application)
                    .withMessageStoreFactory(messageStoreFactory)
                    .withSettings(sessionSettings)
                    .withLogFactory(logFactory)
                    .withMessageFactory(messageFactory)
                    .build();
initiator.setExecutorFactory(new ExecutorFactory() {
                @Override
                public Executor getLongLivedExecutor() {
                    return Executors.newVirtualThreadPerTaskExecutor();
                }

                @Override
                public Executor getShortLivedExecutor() {
                    return Executors.newVirtualThreadPerTaskExecutor();
                }
            });
initiator.start();
